issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

If a user is registering a CC and SC, and happens to use the same name for the --component variable - the first component registers fine, but the second component comes back with an vague error that doesn't tell the user whats really going on:
{code}
# /usr/sbin/euca_conf --register-sc --partition NaturalMystic --host 10.104.10.22 --component IronLionZion
error: StorageControllerBuilder: registration failed with message: Service configuration storing failed for: [StorageControllerConfiguration propertyPrefix=null blockStorageManager=null availableBackends=null partition=NaturalMystic name=IronLionZion hostName=10.104.10.22 port=8773 servicePath=/services/Storage id=8ae88a86419e3e3e01419f76d4d003a3 version=0 creationTimestamp=Wed Oct 09 16:04:27 PDT 2013 lastUpdateTimestamp=Wed Oct 09 16:04:27 PDT 2013 naturalId=1a9ec8ba-1317-4d9c-826b-3a814841b580]
{code}

*Signs*

* After the cluster controller, the following error is seen when registering the storage controller:
{code}
[root@odc-c-06 ~]# /usr/sbin/euca_conf --register-cluster --partition NaturalMystic --host 10.104.10.22 --component IronLionZion
Created new partition 'NaturalMystic'
SERVICE	cluster        	NaturalMystic  	IronLionZion   	LOADED    	46  	http://10.104.10.22:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:NaturalMystic:cluster:IronLionZion/
The authenticity of host '10.104.10.22 (10.104.10.22)' can't be established.
RSA key fingerprint is 5f:cd:a1:55:3e:96:be:e1:84:f5:48:f1:bc:21:3d:de.
Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? yes
Warning: Permanently added '10.104.10.22' (RSA) to the list of known hosts.
[root@odc-c-06 ~]# /usr/sbin/euca_conf --register-sc --partition NaturalMystic --host 10.104.10.22 --component IronLionZion
error: StorageControllerBuilder: registration failed with message: Service configuration storing failed for: [StorageControllerConfiguration propertyPrefix=null blockStorageManager=null availableBackends=null partition=NaturalMystic name=IronLionZion hostName=10.104.10.22 port=8773 servicePath=/services/Storage id=8ae88a86419e3e3e01419f76d4d003a3 version=0 creationTimestamp=Wed Oct 09 16:04:27 PDT 2013 lastUpdateTimestamp=Wed Oct 09 16:04:27 PDT 2013 naturalId=1a9ec8ba-1317-4d9c-826b-3a814841b580]
{code}

The following error is seen in the cloud-error.log:
{code}
Caused by: org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint "uk_i1taqfrjemk23lnlf0vcok1fp"
  Detail: Key (config_component_name)=(IronLionZion) already exists.
        at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.receiveErrorResponse(QueryExecutorImpl.java:2157)
        at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.processResults(QueryExecutorImpl.java:1886)
        at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.execute(QueryExecutorImpl.java:255)
        at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement.execute(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:555)
        at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement.executeWithFlags(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:417)
        at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement.executeUpdate(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:363)
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor197.invoke(Unknown Source)
{code}

*Steps*

* Set up a Eucalyptus 3.4 cloud, with the following topology:
** 1 x CLC/Walrus
** 1 x CC/SC 
* Register Walrus
* Register CC then the SC using the same component name

*Pertinent Data*

Added sosreports from CLC/Walrus, and CC/SC.

*Workaround*

After realizing that this was done, I just registered the component with a different component name.
fields.summary: Vague Error When Registering CC and SC with same component name
fields.environment:
*non-HA*

{code}
SERVICE	jetty          	eucalyptus     	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Jetty  	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.104.10.6/
SERVICE	loadbalancing  	loadbalancing  	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:eucalyptus:loadbalancing:loadbalancing:10.104.10.6/
SERVICE	autoscaling    	autoscaling    	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:eucalyptus:autoscaling:autoscaling:10.104.10.6/
SERVICE	storage        	Exodus         	TheHeathen     	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.22:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:Exodus:storage:TheHeathen/
SERVICE	storage        	Legend         	NoWomanNoCry   	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.1.185:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:Legend:storage:NoWomanNoCry/
SERVICE	tokens         	eucalyptus     	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Tokens 	arn:euca:eucalyptus::tokens:10.104.10.6/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.104.10.6/
SERVICE	euare          	eucalyptus     	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Euare  	arn:euca:eucalyptus::euare:10.104.10.6/
SERVICE	bootstrap      	bootstrap      	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::10.104.10.6/
SERVICE	cluster        	Exodus         	NaturalMystic  	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.22:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:Exodus:cluster:NaturalMystic/
SERVICE	cluster        	Legend         	IsThisLove     	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.1.185:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:Legend:cluster:IsThisLove/
SERVICE	dns            	eucalyptus     	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Dns    	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:10.104.10.6/
SERVICE	reporting      	bootstrap      	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Reporting	arn:euca:bootstrap::reporting:10.104.10.6/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	StirItUp       	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Walrus 	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:StirItUp/
SERVICE	notifications  	eucalyptus     	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Notifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.104.10.6/
SERVICE	cloudwatch     	cloudwatch     	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:eucalyptus:cloudwatch:cloudwatch:10.104.10.6/
{code}

comments.body:
When the above error occurred, the following is seen in the cloud-output.log:
{code}
Wed Oct 9 16:04:27 2013 ERROR [ServiceConfigurations:Configuration.06] [com.eucalyptus.records.BaseRecord.error(BaseRecord.java):173] :1381359867102:ServiceConfigurations:bf27f619-6788-45c6-9bf2-bd68f25ee1d6:arn:aws:euare:407837561996:user/admin:COMPONENT_REGISTERED:FAILED:ServiceConfiguration storage arn:euca:eucalyptus:NaturalMystic:storage:IronLionZion/ 10.104.10.22:8773:/services/Storage:PRIMORDIAL
Wed Oct 9 16:04:27 2013 ERROR [ComponentRegistrationHandler:Configuration.06] [com.eucalyptus.component.ComponentRegistrationHandler.register(ComponentRegistrationHandler.java):165] javax.persistence.PersistenceException: Service configuration storing failed for: [StorageControllerConfiguration propertyPrefix=null blockStorageManager=null availableBackends=null partition=NaturalMystic name=IronLionZion hostName=10.104.10.22 port=8773 servicePath=/services/Storage id=8ae88a86419e3e3e01419f76d4d003a3 version=0 creationTimestamp=Wed Oct 09 16:04:27 PDT 2013 lastUpdateTimestamp=Wed Oct 09 16:04:27 PDT 2013 naturalId=1a9ec8ba-1317-4d9c-826b-3a814841b580]
javax.persistence.PersistenceException: Service configuration storing failed for: [StorageControllerConfiguration propertyPrefix=null blockStorageManager=null availableBackends=null partition=NaturalMystic name=IronLionZion hostName=10.104.10.22 port=8773 servicePath=/services/Storage id=8ae88a86419e3e3e01419f76d4d003a3 version=0 creationTimestamp=Wed Oct 09 16:04:27 PDT 2013 lastUpdateTimestamp=Wed Oct 09 16:04:27 PDT 2013 naturalId=1a9ec8ba-1317-4d9c-826b-3a814841b580]

        at org.hibernate.exception.internal.SQLStateConversionDelegate.convert(SQLStateConversionDelegate.java:129)

        at org.hibernate.event.internal.DefaultFlushEventListener.onFlush(DefaultFlushEventListener.java:52)
        at org.hibernate.internal.SessionImpl.flush(SessionImpl.java:1234)
        at org.hibernate.internal.SessionImpl.managedFlush(SessionImpl.java:404)

Caused by: org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint "uk_i1taqfrjemk23lnlf0vcok1fp"
  Detail: Key (config_component_name)=(IronLionZion) already exists.
        at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.receiveErrorResponse(QueryExecutorImpl.java:2157)
        at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.processResults(QueryExecutorImpl.java:1886)
        at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.execute(QueryExecutorImpl.java:255)

        at com.sun.proxy.$Proxy136.executeUpdate(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor196.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
        at org.logicalcobwebs.proxool.ProxyStatement.invoke(ProxyStatement.java:100)
        at org.logicalcobwebs.proxool.ProxyStatement.intercept(ProxyStatement.java:57)
        at $java.lang.AutoCloseable$$EnhancerByProxool$$6317784a.executeUpdate(<generated>)
        at org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.ResultSetReturnImpl.executeUpdate(ResultSetReturnImpl.java:133)
        ... 75 more
{code}

Looks like we see the violation in the DB.  Seems like we just need to return a readable error message.
[~sjones], do you see a way to avoid collisions?
[~vasya], not sure what you mean, the caller specifies the name to use.
[~sjones], could registration service report that the name is already in use and fail gracefully?
[~vasya], yes, we should have a better error for duplicate names.
